about_the_game:
You’ve been unfairly laid off by Mega Corp and the news kills you. Literally. As a vengeful spirit, use your ghostly powers to solve puzzles by strategically flinging cups, chairs, and tables at your co-workers. Plan your moves, start chain reactions, and watch the chaos unfold in this casual, physics-based puzzle destruction game.

WORK SUCKS. BREAK STUFF!

Haunt and Hassle

Possess office supplies and equipment, turning them into tools of calculated chaos. Send your former colleagues into ragdoll mayhem, sparking fits of rage as they wreak havoc on each other. Clear levels by maximising the number of co-workers you manipulate and the amount of property damage you cause. Every object, every throw, and every move counts!

Revenge is Sweet

Earn soul coins to unlock up to 45 unique moves that challenge your problem-solving skills. Experiment with runes that modify the gameplay, letting you approach each puzzle with fresh tactics. Discover wild effects like zero gravity, black holes, multi-throw, and so much more. Each battle and level brings fresh surprises, so no two fights are ever alike!

Customise the Carnage

Flex your creativity by designing custom levels and characters. Tailor the environment and your co-workers' appearances to create the perfect puzzle scenarios. Every setting offers new challenges and opportunities for you to rank higher on the leaderboard.

Features

  • Wreak havoc and solve physics-based puzzles in a destructible office environment using everyday office supplies turned into outrageous weapons.
  • Battle in diverse, quirky office-themed locations, each with their own manager to battle.
  • Haunt your coworkers in a variety of room-based puzzles with customizable levels, characters, and ragdoll physics.
  • Enjoy infinite redos of each level for endless replayability.
  • Challenge yourself to maximum carnage in chaos mode.
  • Climb the in-game leaderboards to show off your office brawling prowess.

reviews:
“With the game's semi-official motto being "Work sucks, break stuff", Office Fight provides an ideal way to vent your real-life frustrations, especially in light of the ongoing wave of layoffs that has been affecting the gaming industry this year.”
80 Level

“Office Fight will let you live out your darkest desires by becoming a ghost and causing chaos in your office building”
Gaming Bible

“Individual stages look to have lots of little tailor-made interactions that result in fun violence, like a Rube Goldberg machine where the ‘Goldberg’ is actually professional wrestler Goldberg!”
Rock Paper Shotgun
